definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: because the accent's very different from what we teach in South America mainly.
sentences.chinese: 因爲口音跟我們在南美主要教的口音很不一樣。

sentences.english: Aquatic resources along the coast of South America.
Ivory fruit is a kind of South America Ecuador palm trees coconut.
sentences.chinese: 象牙果是一種南美厄瓜多爾的棕櫚樹椰果。

sentences.english: The pampas are still among the most fecund lands in the world.
sentences.chinese: 南美大草原仍然是世界上最肥沃的土地之一。

sentences.english: Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分佈在全世界的熱帶，以南美洲的熱帶雨林地區最多。

sentences.english: Cocona fruit is another tropical fruit found in the mountainous regions of South America.
sentences.chinese: 可可果是在南美洲山區發現的別一種熱帶水果。

sentences.english: Income growth continues to fall behind East Asia and South America.
sentences.chinese: 這些國家的收入增長繼續落後於東亞和南美。

sentences.english: In South America, a weedy corn relative, teosinte, dresses the edges of domesticated cornfields.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲的玉米田周圍，長着它們的野生親戚，蜀黍。

sentences.english: At the southern end of South America lies the jewel of Patagonia.
sentences.chinese: 南美洲南端的巴塔哥尼亞嵌上了寶石一樣。

sentences.english: I have been elected best goalkeeper by the South America Foot-ball Federation in succession three years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 我連續三年被南美足球聯合會推舉爲最佳守門員。

sentences.english: Any of various small greenish birds of the genus Hylophilus of Central and South America, related to the vireos.
sentences.chinese: 中南美主要爲附生或石生蘭花的一個大屬，大小不同。

sentences.english: The Toco Toucan lives in central and eastern South America.
sentences.chinese: 託科巨嘴鳥生活在南美中部和西部地區。

sentences.english: It is a similar story across the region.
sentences.chinese: 整個南美地區上演着類似的故事。

sentences.english: It's called la conga which is one of the most popular dances in South America.
sentences.chinese: 這叫做康茄舞，這種舞是在南美洲最流行的一種。

sentences.english: The Federative Republic of Brazil is the largest country in South America.
sentences.chinese: 巴西聯邦共和國是南美洲最大的國家。

sentences.english: He believed that a wildly rich uncle in South America was going to leave him a fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他堅信南美有個大富翁叔叔要留給他一筆遺產。

definition: America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
